message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm willing to part with for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'd be happy to pay $85 for it, considering the value I place on it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to go up to $90 for it.
Bob, I understand that you're getting close, but I'm not ready to give up on getting a better price for my product. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $98.
